summary: Colour scheme based on ECLM and wombat schemes
name: eclm_wombat.vim
description:
This is based largely on the gorgeous ECLM textmate theme from eclips3.media and I used the wombat scheme file as a starting point. 

Preview:
http://img78.imageshack.us/img78/279/eclmwombatre3.png

Enjoy!
install_details:
Put eclm_wombat.vim into ~/.vim/colors/ 

Put colorscheme eclm_wombat into .gvimrc or .vimrc.
